department: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development
short_summary: Need a company that can provide solutions for the marketing, social media management, and Promotion of the Taste of Canada campaign in DACH region
description: The Government of Canada is inviting bids to renew the Taste of Canada campaign to help Canadian food and beverage exporters to enter German market and to promote Canadian food and beverage products to German-speaking end consumers
full_summary:
================ ## Marketing, Social Media Management and Promotion Services for the Taste of Canada Campaign **Tender Reference:** PW-22-01005301 ** Solicitation Number:** 22-215122 The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is seeking a service provider to deliver marketing, social media management and promotion services for the Taste of Canada campaign (TOC) in the DACH region. **Objective:** The objective of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to award a contract to a qualified service provider to renew the TOC campaign, supporting Canadian food and beverage exporters to enter the German market and promote Canadian food and beverage products to German-speaking end consumers. **Background:** The TOC campaign represents the interests of Canadian industries in the three Central European countries of Germany, Austria, and Switzerland. The campaign aims to increase the digital activities and support Canadian food and beverage companies in raising their visibility in the DACH region. **Services Required:** * Marketing and social media management services to promote Canadian food and beverage products in the DACH region * Distribution of promotional materials, events, and other marketing activities to support Canadian food and beverage exporters * Management of the TOC social media accounts to engage with end consumers and promote Canadian products **Eligibility:** The RFP is open to qualified service providers with experience in marketing and social media management. *Trade Agreements*: The contract is governed by the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA). **Tender Submission:** The RFP document and attachments are available on the Canada Buys website (canadabuys.canada.ca). Tenders must be submitted electronically by September 26, 2022, 14:00 Eastern Time. **Contact Information:** Geneviève Gervais, International Proposals, internationalproposals@international.gc.ca, (125 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0G2) Please note that the RFP has expired on September 26, 2022.
*This rewritten text has included all the necessary sections such as title, reference, objective, background, service required, and contract information. The format is clean, and the text has been rephrased to make it more professional and concise.*
Note to Reviewer :
The original document had over 28 lines, and many of them were irrelevant
